author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Costumes for a Cure dance
text:
Costumes for a Cure dance Oct 26, 2015 
Union — Midcoast rockers Creatures of Habit will provide the tunes for a benefit costume dance Friday, Oct. 30, from 8 to 11:30 p.m. at Thompson Community Center, 51 South Union Road/Route 131, Union. 
Costumes for a Cure is sponsored by PALS for Living as a fundraiser for the American Cancer Society Relay for Life of Midcoast Maine. Admission is a donation of $20, $30 for a couple. Doors will open 7:30 p.m. for the BYOB event, which includes a costume contest with prizes. For more information, call 542-9657. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
